org.mt4j.components.visibleComponents.shapes.mesh
Class MTSphere

java.lang.Object
  org.mt4j.components.MTComponent

All Implemented Interfaces:
IMTComponent, IMTComponent3D, IMTInputEventListener, IGestureEventListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
PhysicsSphere
public class MTSphere
extends MTTriangleMesh

Sphere represents a 3D object with all points equidistance from a center point.

Version:
$Revision$, $Date$
Author:
Joshua Slack, Christopher Ruff

                float radius,
                MTSphere.TextureMode texMode)
Constructs a sphere with center at the origin. For details, see the other constructor.

Parameters:
name - Name of sphere.
zSamples - The samples along the Z.
radialSamples - The samples along the radial.
radius - Radius of the sphere.

MTSphere

public MTSphere(processing.core.PApplet pa,
                java.lang.String name,
                Vector3D center,
                int zSamples,
                int radialSamples,
                float radius)
Constructs a sphere. All geometry data buffers are updated automatically. Both zSamples and radialSamples increase the quality of the generated sphere.

Parameters:
name - Name of the sphere.
center - Center of the sphere.
zSamples - The number of samples along the Z.
radialSamples - The number of samples along the radial.
radius - The radius of the sphere.

MTSphere

public MTSphere(processing.core.PApplet pa,
                java.lang.String name,
                Vector3D center,
                int zSamples,
                int radialSamples,
                float radius,
                boolean useEvenSlices,
                MTSphere.TextureMode texMode)
Constructs a sphere. Additional arg to evenly space latitudinal slices

Parameters:
name - Name of the sphere.
center - Center of the sphere.
zSamples - The number of samples along the Z.
radialSamples - The number of samples along the radial.
radius - The radius of the sphere.
useEvenSlices - Slice sphere evenly along the Z axis

computeDefaultBounds

protected IBoundingShape computeDefaultBounds()
Description copied from class: AbstractShape
Computes a default bounding box for the shape. This gets called after setting creating a shape and its setGeometryInfo method is called.

setTextureMode

@Deprecated
public void setTextureMode(int textureMode)
Deprecated. Use enum version of setTextureMode

Description copied from class: AbstractShape
Sets the way texture coordinates are handled in processing. This setting is not considered if using OpenGL mode! Allowed values are: PApplet.NORMALIZED and PApplet.IMAGE
Default is PApplet.NORMALIZED. Which indicates that the texture coordinates should be in normalized range from 0.0 to 1.0! In image mode they have to range from 0..imageDimensions.

Overrides:
setTextureMode in class AbstractShape
Parameters:
textureMode - The textureMode to set.

setTextureMode

public void setTextureMode(MTSphere.TextureMode textureMode)
Parameters:
textureMode - The textureMode to set.

updateGeometry

public void updateGeometry(processing.core.PApplet pa,
                           Vector3D center,
                           int zSamples,
                           int radialSamples,
                           float radius)
Changes the information of the sphere into the given values.

Parameters:
center - the center of the sphere.
zSamples - the number of zSamples of the sphere.
radialSamples - the number of radial samples of the sphere.
radius - the radius of the sphere.
